viewtier.ui
Class Panel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--viewtier.ui.Component
        |
        +--viewtier.ui.Panel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Tabs
public class Panel
extends Component

Class Panel is responsible for being a generic container for other Viewtier compents. Design of the Pane implements composite design pattern.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
Panel()
          Creates Panel object and sets default charactersitics for the Panel.

 Panel add(Component comp)
          Adds component to the pane.

          Adds component to the pane.
 void clear()
          Clears content of the panel by removing all the components from it.

          Removes component from the pane.

Constructor Detail

Panel

public Panel()
Creates Panel object and sets default charactersitics for the Panel. By default padding is 0, horizontal align is Layout.LEFT and vertical align is Layout.TOP.
Method Detail

add

public Panel add(Component comp)
Adds component to the pane. This method returns a reference to the pane itself.

The reference allows subsequence adds without referencing temporary variable.

Parameters:
comp - - compenent to add
See Also:
Layout

add

public Panel add(Component comp,
                 Layout layout)
Adds component to the pane. This method returns a reference to the pane itself.

The reference allows subsequence adds without referencing temporary variable.

Parameters:
comp - - compenent to add
layout - - position of the compenent in the panel
See Also:
Layout

clear

public void clear()
Clears content of the panel by removing all the components from it.

remove

public Component remove(Component comp)
Removes component from the pane. This method returns a reference to the deleted component.
